person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The conservative Radical Democrats ( FDP ) have said they would ask parliament next week to order Swiss banks to put some 40 million Swiss francs ( $ 31 million ) in dormant wealth into a fund earmarked for Jewish groups and charitable organisations .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Person":

1. Radical Democrats (FDP) - a political party
2. parliament - a legislative body
3. Jewish groups - organizations or communities representing Jewish people
4. charitable organizations - organizations that provide aid or support to various causes.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to "Person" in the paragraph:

1. Radical Democrats (FDP) - a political party
2. Jewish groups - organizations or communities representing Jewish people

The other entities in the paragraph (such as "parliament" and "charitable organizations") are not relevant to the concept of "Person".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the entities that refer to "Person" in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Person":

| Person |
| --- |
| Radical Democrats (FDP) |
| Jewish groups |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
